subject: Jonathan day- order ssn2810 -shipped?
description_text:
ï»¿hello, 

I placed an order earlier in the week but have not seen a tracking number yet, just seeing if it has shipped yet? Order number SSN2810

Thanks,
Jonathan Day 
615-556-8119


Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Jonathan Day,    We apologize for the delay. We are currently on an 8-day holiday break and will ship your order on the 9th. Thank you for your understanding and patience.
